AddShoppers

Moving onward from Toucan

Nothing much to see here yet

I’ve only been working at AddShoppers for a few months, after the team at my company, Toucan AI, got “acqui-hired” by them in January 2021.

While you can learn more about what AddShoppers does here, I’d encourage you to check out my pages on Toucan and my personal stance on future startups I’d be involved in if you’re interested in learning more about me.
